name: Popcorn Chicken Bites

ingredients.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 375° F. Coat chicken pieces with oil. Place crumb mix in resealable plastic bag. Working with a few pieces at a time, shake gently until evenly coated. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Cook 15–20 min, until chicken is cooked through. Serve with your favourite dip, aioli, or gravy.
tips: Make it vegetarian and swap chicken for tofu. Add leftovers to nourish bowls or use as poutine topper.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup dark leafy greens, 1 cup mixed veggies, 1⁄2 cup cooked grains, 1⁄2 cup starchy veggies and a Tbsp of your favourite Epicure Salad Dressing
